title: Wave Smart+—An Innovative, New Universal Dock for Smart Watches Announced
text:
October 01, We believe your readers would appreciate the new WAVE Smart+ offered by Zurske that is live on Kickstarter.
Made in the U.S. without any overseas components or sub-components, the WAVE Smart+ Edition is the “smart” choice in wearable device charging stations. What started as one of the most elegant Apple Watch charging stands on the market, it is now adaptable to multiple platforms. This list now includes the Pebble Time, Time Round, and Time Steel, as well as the Fitbit Surge with several more being developed currently. Now users can invest in a docking solution without worrying about premature obsolescence. The WAVE Smart+ is designed specifically with form and function in mind. Due to a large amount of feedback from testers and customers of both the WAVE and our competition’s products, we now include a unique coating process that prevents surface scratches on your watch. Plus, with three cord placement options, you can easily customize the WAVE to fit your placement needs and eliminate the clutter of unsightly cords.
Some notable words from our customers:
… “This stand is hands down the sturdiest, best looking, and highest quality stand I have ever seen.”
– Dimitri, OR
“The Wave shows off my new Apple Watch, looks stylish and reminds me to charge it every night”
– Andy, TX
OUR MANTRA AT ZURSKE IS THIS:
Make products that invoke creative emotion and appeal to those who value function with form.
Rare to the industry, Zurske offers flexibility of service throughout the manufacturing process. Zurske’s honed engineering skills develop product designs using the latest manufacturing technology and processes from only the highest quality materials. The Texas-based ISO certified manufacturing facility is streamlined and proven to fully serve our customers from across the street or across the globe.
Special Offer
Confident in our product, we’re offering limited samples to qualified users so you can credibly prove to your readers the outstanding benefits and customer service of the WAVE Smart+.
